_usage: This json file has the environment setup that is not to be changed per run.
_disclaimer: Testing is performed on a single set of values. Changing them might affect the functionality.
_options: All types and options are explained in SSITH-FETT-Target/fett/base/utils/configData.json

test_200.cweText: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor

test_201.cweText: Exposure of Sensitive Information Through Sent Data

test_202.cweText: Exposure of Sensitive Information Through Data Queries

test_212.cweText: Improper Removal of Sensitive Information Before Storage or Transfer

test_214.cweText: Invocation of Process Using Visible Sensitive Information

test_226.cweText: Sensitive Information Uncleared in Resource Before Release for Reuse

test_244.cweText: Improper Clearing of Heap Memory Before Release ('Heap Inspection')

test_524.cweText: Use of Cache Containing Sensitive Information

test_526.cweText: Exposure of Sensitive Information Through Environmental Variables

test_612.cweText: Improper Authorization of Index Containing Sensitive Information
